Chennai Port Trust Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 04 Pilot Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 25, 2025, 17:01 IST
 Tamil Nadu Public Service Commission
 4 Jobs |  Posted On : 25-Aug-2025 |  Tamil Nadu |  Salary : 70,000 to 200,000




FOLLOW

The Chennai Port Trust has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 04 Pilot Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass, 12th Pass can grab this chance and apply for the Chennai Port Trust Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can fill out the application form before the last date of application.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can also apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Tamil Nadu.

Chennai Port Trust Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Pilot	04	10th Pass, 12th

Age Limit for the Chennai Port Trust Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 18 years
The Maximum Age Limit: 40 years.

Selection Process for the Chennai Port Trust Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the Chennai Port Trust Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 70,000 /- per month.
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 2,00,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the Chennai Port Trust Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the Chennai Port Trust Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Pilot Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form carefully.
Then, send the application form along with the relevant documents to the address given below.

Address

Deputy Conservator, Marine Department, Chennai Port Authority No.1, Rajaji Salai, Chennai-600001.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	25-08-2025
Last Date of Application	19-09-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
